Posts.EditableText:
Looking at your Wiki... You don't have plans for a UI programming interface...
But I'm picturing how I could do it in VB...
Have a button that when pressed, will print out a code block that the programmer can copy into Notepad then edit it as needed...
Each "command" will be a external text file so that the VB program will not need updating as new functions are added...
Maybe a drop down box for code blocks that can be filled in as needed...
